abstract: Milivoje Novaković (born 18 May 1979 in Ljubljana) is a Slovenian footballer of Serb descent, who currently plays for Japanese side Shimizu S-Pulse.
comment: Milivoje Novaković (born 18 May 1979 in Ljubljana) is a Slovenian footballer of Serb descent, who currently plays for Japanese side Shimizu S-Pulse.
